about.description: I am Abdulrahman E. Elbedawey, a versatile and detail-oriented Full-Stack Developer based in Alexandria, Egypt. I specialize in designing, building, and optimizing web applications from front-end to back-end.
about.additionalInfo: My expertise lies in React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion for creating seamless user interfaces, as well as Node.js, PHP, Electron, and SQL for robust server-side logic and data management. I'm experienced in automating workflows, integrating APIs, and delivering scalable, high-performance solutions. Quick to learn new technologies and adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams to drive impactful, user-centric products.

experiences.title: Freelance Full-Stack Developer
experiences.description: Developed enterprise-grade solutions including a Multi-Language News & Social Intelligence Platform with NLP.js for Arabic categorization, an Enterprise Request Management System handling 1M+ records with sub-100ms response times, and a Custom Power BI Geospatial Visual achieving 40% performance improvement over standard visuals.

experiences.title: Web Developer (Part-time)
experiences.description: Revamped the organization's website with a modern, fully responsive UI using React and Firebase. Strategically minimized Firebase API requests to maintain performance while leveraging free Netlify hosting to eliminate monthly costs.

experiences.title: Web Development Intern
experiences.description: Completed intensive training program focused on Web Development using Content Management Systems (CMS). Gained hands-on experience with modern web development practices and tools.

techStack.name: React Ecosystem
techStack.description: Advanced component architecture with React.js, Next.js, Redux, and React Router. Specialized in Virtual DOM manipulation, state management patterns, and modern hooks.

techStack.name: Node.js & Express
techStack.description: Server-side JavaScript execution with Node.js and Express.js. Capable of handling high-throughput asynchronous operations, REST API development, and microservices architecture.

techStack.name: Database Management
techStack.description: Robust data storage solutions with SQL (SQLite, SQL Server) and MongoDB. Proficient in designing schemas, optimizing complex queries, and achieving sub-100ms response times.

techStack.name: UI/UX Design
techStack.description: Creating intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces with Figma, Photoshop, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion. Focus on responsive design and seamless user experiences.
